title: Twice is not Enough
description: After several disastrous engagements, Lady Minerva Peters is an expert at suppressing her own needs. Only in the darkness of night does she give in to her wanton desires with a fantasy lover.In the middle of a crowded ballroom, she learns her father is not yet ready to let her fade into spinsterhood. Humiliated, she ducks into a dark alcove only to find out she's not alone. Her hiding spot is occupied by a captivating stranger. Before she can escape, the two become voyeurs to another coupleâ€™s sexual rendezvous. The atmosphere heats up and so does her body, especially with the tempting offers whispered in her ear.Will Minerva deny her needs once again or will she embrace the anonymity of their seclusion and finally explore her basic impulses and the startling attraction to the compelling mystery man?**Originally released in January 2011, the title has been expanded and now contains a bonus epilogue.**
author: Emma Lai
